name: The Fable of a Rabbit
description:
Explore the vast world of Leerea and discover its unique inhabitants. Witness the rebellion that is brewing and reveal who the Gods of the Sky really are. Who said that a rabbit could not live an enormous adventure?

* The Fable of a Rabbit is an adventure rpg and building game; in a huge fantasy & sci-fi world full of creatures, NPCs, stories, and mysteries to discover.

* Learn dozens of skills like alchemy, blacksmithing and many more! You will equip armor, use swords and all kinds of weapons, consume miraculous potions, hunt animals and creatures of the most varied, discover unknown flora and fauna, sail the waters, travel to distant lands, conquer unexplored places, fight with dangerous creatures and much more. Without forgetting that you can establish your own Village where you can settle down and forge a destiny forever.

* Be a famous Explorer, a renowned Investigator, a courageous Hunter and even more, among the many Specialties that you can choose from.

* Witness the relationship and the battle between different factions. Where you will win friends or enemies depending on which side you choose while fighting inequality and injustice between species.

* Reveal who the Gods of the Sky really are. What led them to come here and what role they played in the emergence of the Evolved.

* Explore every corner of this fascinating continent and its islands in search of unreal objects, treasures, and answers to all kinds of intrigues. Who are the Nomads? Is it true that they can escape death?

* Relate to dozens of NPCs of different species and you will be able to know every detail of them. Each NPC is unique and has its own characteristics, opinions and wishes. You will make friends, trade with them and, of course, you will get enemies when you least expect it.

* Not only will you feel that you live in an extraordinary world, but you will discover that you are an active part of it. The environment will know what decisions you have made, and the adventure will act accordingly. The building aspect of the game will allow you to create a place of your own. Where you can choose which buildings to have and who will be able to live and work there. Do you want to trade bread? Then you must build a bakery! Do you want to sell vegetables? Starting with a few crops would be a good idea. The Village is your own place in this world. But will it be an oasis of peace?
